Text: A/V quality is fine, audio is in sync. Thank you for the upload.

Why is this episode so popular and the others are not?
Do people stop seeding after 1:1 and so only the most recent is populated or what?
cant seed every episode forever, newer ones are gonna be more popular until someone posts the whole season when it is done

That's right.. the most current episodes will generally always have more seeds then older ones..

I find direct download is better for older episodes rather then torrent.. that way you don't rely on seeders
